The '''''Moose Jaw Times-Herald: Weekend Magazine'' (Vol. 18, No. 35)''', published on [[31 August]] [[1968]], is a weekend supplement of the Canadian newspaper ''[[Wikipedia:Moose Jaw Times-Herald|Moose Jaw Times-Herald]]''. It includes a reprint of the [[The Man Who Understands Hobbits|Plimmers' interview]] with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] ("The Brains behind Bilbo Baggins", pp. 6â€“8).<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/newbb/viewtopic.php?topic_id=1817&viewmode=flat&order=ASC&type=&mode=0&start=485|articlename=Interesting eBay Auctions (see posts from 27 February 2014)|dated=|website=Guide|accessed=17 March 2014}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.ebay.com/itm/Rare-1968-Weekend-Magazine-J-R-R-Tolkien-The-Hobbit-article-photos-Canada-/111272791300|articlename=Rare 1968 " Weekend Magazine" J.R.R Tolkien The Hobbit article & photos Canada (item number 111272791300)|dated=11 February 2014|website=[http://www.ebay.com/ eBay.com]|accessed=17 March 2014}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=55110|articlename=Daily Telegraph Magazine. 1968|dated=|website=TB|accessed=17 March 2014}}</ref>
